description: A Rocket.Chat App declaration for usage inside of Rocket.Chat.
title: Rocket.Chat App

___name.description: The public visible name of this App.

___requiredApiVersion.description: The required version of the App's API which this App depends on. This uses the semver format.

___description.description: A description of this App, used to explain what this App does and provides for the user.

___version.description: The version of this App which will be used for display publicly and letting users know there is an update. This uses the semver format.

___classFile.description: The name of the file which contains your App TypeScript source code.

___iconFile.description: The name of the file to use as the icon.

___assetsFolder.description: The name of the folder which contains all of your resources, it should not start with a period.

___name.description: The author's name who created this App.

___support.description: The place where people can get support for this App, whether email or website.

___homepage.description: The homepage for this App, it can be a Github or the author's website.

___nameSlug.description: A url friendly slugged version of your App's name.

___id.description: The App's unique identifier in uuid v4 format. This is optional, although recommended, however if you are going to publish on the App store, you will be assigned one.
